summary:
I am a Licensed EAP Counselor for OPTUM/UnitedHealth Group. 

I have experience providing management, clinical supervision, treatment plan review, individual tele-mental health counseling, psychotherapy, group therapy, mental health counseling, grief counseling, anger management, relapse prevention, family counseling, pre- & post-marital counseling, counseling for domestic violence & trauma, ASAM assessments, crisis management, and case management. I have also participated in involuntary commitment hearings and utilization review.

I hold the following credentials:
 ▪  Licensed in 7 states: LPC: AL, CO, GA, LA, MS, PA
 ▪  TLHT Licensed TeleMental Health Counselor in FL
 ▪  ICADC International Certified Alcohol Drug Counselor
 ▪  NCC National Board-Certified Counselor
 ▪  BC-TMH Board-Certified Telemental Health Provider
 ▪  Certified Grief Recovery Method Specialist
 ▪  CCTP Certified Clinical Trauma Professional 
 ▪  C-DBT Certified Dialectical Behavior Therapy Professional 
 ▪  Certified Prepare/Enrich Relationship Facilitator
 ▪  Level 2 Trained in Gottman Method Couples Therapy
 ▪  Certificate in Trauma-focused tf-CBT 
 ▪  Certificate in CBTi for Insomnia

projects.description: ▪ Design and Project Management of McRae Public Relations firm; 15,000 square foot office on the penthouse level of landmark Equitable Building in downtown Atlanta. This was a very unique and fun space to design and manage.  Won Atlanta Downtown Design Excellence Award (ADDEA) 2007 Award of Distinction.  http://mcrae.com/place.html

projects.description: ▪ Designed and Project Managed the repositioning and renovation of 1 Million+ square foot common area in the Terraces Office Complex in the prestigious Central Perimeter Business District of Atlanta. This was a $25M commercial office renovation of two 11-story towers on a 25-acre site. The project included renovation of all finishes, new elevator cabs, a new feature interior stair case, 2 new reception centers, new signage, new stone floor imported from Germany, redesign of existing interior water features, new interior and exterior lighting, landscape and exterior renovation, and much more.  Nominated for Atlanta Urban Land Inst. (ULI) Real Estate Awards Renovation of the Year, 2008.  www.terracesperimetercenter.com

message.text: Just finished the course “Supporting Your Mental Health While Working from Home”!

ingestedContentSummary.description: Check out my certificate for “Improving Your Mental Health at Work”: https://www.linkedin.com/learning/certificates/cfc5d30ba3414cc0b9d13a4b6592400579596bc251fe75f896a9528e7d479b53.
ingestedContentSummary.fullText: Employee mental health is a hot topic of discussion in today’s workplace. This course, led by psychologist Karen Doll, discusses the importance of mental health awareness in the work environment. Karen details science-backed stress management techniques that are accessible and practical, like regulating one’s inner state and energy. She guides you as you elevate your mental model by incorporating healthy thinking, emotional literacy, and self-compassion practices. Learn methods to build resilience, developing a flow state, starting a “personal book of awesome,” seeking gratitude and service, and nurturing connections. She’ll teach you how to effectively foster your focus and highlight the importance of setting boundaries. After this course, you’ll be equipped to tend to your own mental health, encourage your colleagues to do the same, and provide your workplace with the tools needed to improve employee mental health. This course was created by Madecraft . We are pleased to host this training in our library. See more See less
ingestedContentSummary.title: Certificate of Completion

message.text: Just finished the course “Improving Your Mental Health at Work” by Madecraft and Karen Doll! Check it out: https://lnkd.in/eCytDdds #mentalhealth #selfcare.

Dawn Kent Wittenberg Scotus gave us that quick answer so CO, IL, ME would have Trmp on the Super Tuesday ballots but we have to wait until end of April for them to decide if he has immunity? Particularly after Jack Smith started asking to get it scheduled back in december. Cmon people there aren't any cases out there more important than having voters know the truth about the Jan 6 insurrection and election interference/Rico trials. I don't care so much about the stolen documents or hush money to stormy. Scotus is sounding more and more corrupt the more we look into them. I spent my life having the utmost respect for them.
This is really scary to me
